product_name: Royal Robbins Backcountry Walker Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Soft yet tough, the women's Royal Robbins Backcountry Walker Shorts tackle trails and rocky perches with a double-layer seat and lots of pockets for gear. Fabric is 3-ply laundered Supplex(R) nylon that's durable, lightweight and wrinkle resistant yet feels as soft as cotton. Offers UPF 50+ sun protection; dries quickly. Adjustable button tabs at waist let you customize the fit; running gusset adds comfort. Storage includes 2 deep hand pockets, 1 secure zippered front pocket and 2 rear pockets with rip-and-stick closure. Royal Robbins Backcountry Walker Shorts for women feature a classic rise and 8 in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: Soft yet tough, the women's Royal Robbins Backcountry Walker Shorts tackle trails and rocky perches with a double-layer seat and lots of pockets for gear.
